title: 大空头重回硅谷：做空甲骨文，英伟达万亿美元AI泡沫即将破灭？
description: 预测次贷危机的“大空头”迈克尔·伯里（Michael Burry）对数万亿美元涌入人工智能基础设施持深深的怀疑态度。
titleZh: 大空头重回硅谷：做空甲骨文，英伟达万亿美元AI泡沫即将破灭？
titleEn: The Big Short Is Back in Silicon Valley: Shorting Oracle, Is Nvidia's Trillion-Dollar AI Bubble About to Burst?
descriptionZh: 预测次贷危机的“大空头”迈克尔·伯里（Michael Burry）对数万亿美元涌入人工智能基础设施持深深的怀疑态度。
descriptionEn: Michael Burry, the "Big Short" who predicted the subprime mortgage crisis, sees trillions pouring into AI infrastructure with deep skepticism. He predicts: Nvidia's advantage won't last, and it may soon be overtaken by competitors. Moreover, global AI computing power has already reached the equivalent of 15 million H100 GPUs, poised to trigger a severe energy crisis!
